meanings.definition: To surpass in rock music performance.
meanings.sent1: The band was outrocking all others at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She loves outrocking her guitar solos during live shows.
meanings.sent3: The guitarist joked that he was outrocking even the speakers with his loud playing.
meanings.sent4: Their energy on stage was outrocking the audience's wildest expectations.
meanings.sent5: The singer's powerful voice was outrocking the entire stadium.

meanings.definition: The act of outperforming in rock music.
meanings.sent2: The award was given for the best outrocking of the year.
meanings.sent3: His outrocking was so impressive that even the critics were speechless.
meanings.sent4: The competition for outrocking was fierce among the bands.
meanings.sent5: The band's outrocking was the highlight of the music festival.

meanings.sent1: They were outrocking every other band in the battle of the bands.
meanings.sent2: The guitarist was outrocking with his amazing solos.
meanings.sent3: Even the sound engineer admitted that the band was outrocking that night.
meanings.sent4: Their performance was outrocking the charts.
meanings.sent5: The drummer's beats were outrocking the rhythm section.
